summary: This is a forwarded email chain from September 2, 2009, regarding a letter about Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves internal discussion about whether it is appropriate to speak with the State Attorney's Office (SAO) and/or victims about the attached letter, which was originally mailed by Mr. Black.

persons.name: Wanda Gomez
persons.context: Sent the attached letter about Jeffrey Epstein on behalf of Mr. Black, forwarding it via email after the original was mailed.

persons.name: Mr. Black
persons.context: Asked Wanda Gomez to email the attached letter about Jeffrey Epstein; the original was mailed the previous day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The forwarded email and attached letter concern Jeffrey Epstein, indicating ongoing discussion or correspondence about him.

connections.description: Wanda Gomez acts on Mr. Black's instruction to email the attached letter about Jeffrey Epstein.
Mr. Black is the sender of a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein, indicating some form of communication or interest in Epstein.

events.title: Original letter mailed about Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Mr. Black mailed an original letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email forwarding of Epstein letter
events.description: Wanda Gomez emails the attached letter about Jeffrey Epstein on behalf of Mr. Black, and the email chain discusses whether to talk to the SAO and/or victims about it.

keyFacts: An email chain from September 2, 2009, discusses a letter about Jeffrey Epstein, indicating ongoing correspondence or interest in his case.
The original letter was mailed by Mr. Black on September 1, 2009, and was forwarded via email by his assistant, Wanda Gomez.
The email raises the question of whether it is appropriate to speak with the State Attorney's Office (SAO) and/or victims about the letter's contents.
